sentence.text: In the case-control analysis, the rs9607195 AAAAAG on intergenic area 250 kb away from the regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II gene and the rs12738007 AAAAAG on the intron of the fatty acid metabolic process gene were the most strongly associated SNPs with the risk of schizophrenia (P = 6.2 × 10(-8) , OR = 0.50 and P = 3.7 × 10(-7) , OR = 2.39, respectively).

entity.text: regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: In subsequent fine-mapping analysis, 6 SNPs of fatty acid metabolic process were genotyped with 310 schizophrenia patients and 604 control subjects.
